name: James N. KOREN, Appellant, v. BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE JERSEY SHORE AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT
name_abbreviation: Koren v. Board of Directors of the Jersey Shore Area School District

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: James N. KOREN, Appellant, v. BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE JERSEY SHORE AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIGRO, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: William A. Hebe, Wellsboro, for Appellant.
J. David Smith, Joanne C. Ludwikowski, Williamsport, for Appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
688 A.2d 166
James N. KOREN, Appellant, v. BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE JERSEY SHORE AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 9, 1996.
Decided Dec. 30, 1996.
William A. Hebe, Wellsboro, for Appellant.
J. David Smith, Joanne C. Ludwikowski, Williamsport, for Appellee.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.
